thread.title: Oilers’ Jordan Eberle sidelined 4-6 weeks with shoulder injury

title: Oilers’ Jordan Eberle sidelined 4-6 weeks with shoulder injury
text:
Hockey Edmonton Oilers’ Jordan Eberle, left, and Arizona Coyotes’ Brad Hunt battle for the puck during the first period of a pre-season game on Sept. 29. (JASON FRANSON/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Edmonton Oilers’ Jordan Eberle, left, and Arizona Coyotes’ Brad Hunt battle for the puck during the first period of a pre-season game on Sept. 29.(JASON FRANSON/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Oilers’ Jordan Eberle sidelined 4-6 weeks with shoulder injury Add to ... Edmonton — The Canadian Press 
Wednesday, Sep. 30, 2015 3:57PM EDT 
Last updated
